code: import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";async function fetchData(e){e.preventDefault();const form=e.target;const formData=new FormData(form);const requestOptions={method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({url:"".concat(formData.get('url'))})};const getTitle=await fetch('https://ytb2mp3-stg-0840c0604471.herokuapp.com/download/title',requestOptions).then(res=>res.json());const response=await fetch('https://ytb2mp3-stg-0840c0604471.herokuapp.com/download/mp3',requestOptions,{responseType:'blob'}).then(res=>res.blob());const url=window.URL.createObjectURL(new Blob([response],{type:'audio/mpeg'}));const link=document.createElement('a');link.href=url;link.setAttribute('download',"".concat(getTitle.url,".mp3"));document.body.appendChild(link);link.click();}function App(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{textAlign:'center'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Youtube MP3 Downloader"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:fetchData,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"url",placeholder:"Link"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",style:{margin:'20px'},children:"Download"})]})]});}export default App;
